creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: river view with two figures and animal in a boat at right, with standing figure rowing; shoreline at left, with hills and trees in background; grey clouds in sky
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

LRC, in  ULC, in the print: [APPIAN 1869]; see Inscription
title: Un soir, bords de Rhône à Rix
